root.name: Hotel Giant 2
root.description: PC System Requirements- Windows 98, 2000, ME, XP or Vista- 1.5 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or processor of the same grade- 512 MB of RAM- Graphics card: NVIDIA GeForce 5 series of above, ATI Radeon 9 series or above, with 256MB video memory- Other requirements: DirectX 9 compatible sound card; keyboard; mouse
